issue.title: [Java] Add implementation of DenseUnionVector.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6352](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6352). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Today only Sparse unions are supported.  We should have a dense union implementation vector that conforms to the IPC protocol (the current sparse union vector doesn't do this and there are other JIRAs covering making it compatible).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6352?focusedCommentId=16915467) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] This sounds interesting and useful.

Can you please point out the "other JIRAs covering"?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6352?focusedCommentId=16917545) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
[~fan_li_ya] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1692?filter=-1 is the one for sparse.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6352?focusedCommentId=16917633) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] Thanks for the information. Will take a closer look.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6352?focusedCommentId=17022711) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5473
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5473>
